sentences.english: Thereare 114 villages in Meng Song Town, and live mainly on tea.
sentences.chinese: 勐宋镇共有114个村寨，生活主要来源在茶。

sentences.english: There was one of the three biggest flatland inMeng Hun, where most of the Dai people live.
sentences.chinese: 勐混有最大的三块平原之一，很多傣族人住在那里。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to call you so late.
sentences.chinese: 对不起这么晚打勐电话来。

sentences.english: Objective To know the typhoid outbreak in Laomeng Miao People in Jinping County in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解金平县老勐苗族乡伤寒爆发情况。
